Package teapot.builder.utils.converters

Class RouteConverter

java.lang.Object
teapot.builder.utils.converters.RouteConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Converter<Route>
public final class RouteConverter extends Object implements Converter<Route>
Converter implementation for encoding and decoding Route objects to and from CSV format.
